effect.short: User receives 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  User takes 1/4 the damage it inflicts in recoil.

flavorTexts.text:
The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes
into its target. This also damages the user a little.
